name: shopify
api_data_query: select     tenant_id,     cast(raw_date as varchar) as raw_date,     cast(sum(ORDERS) as bigint) as data from platform_offline.integration_api_data_view where RAW_PLATFORM = 'shopify'   and RAW_DATE > utc_date() - interval 90 day group by 1, 2
wm_data_query: select     tenant_id,     cast(date(order_create_time) as varchar) as raw_date,     count(order_id) as data from platform_offline.dwd_view_portrait_order_dim_shopify_latest where order_create_time > utc_date() - interval 90 day group by 1, 2

name: amazonVendorPartner
wm_data_query: select tenant_id, cast(stat_date as varchar) as raw_date, sum(shipped_units) as data from platform_offline.amazon_vendor_zip_code_daily_report where stat_date > utc_date() - interval 90 day group by 1, 2;
